ing: 3 (8 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes with liquid, chopped
2 (4 ounce) cans chopped green chiles, with juice
des: "Got this recipe from an anthropologist friend in Arizona, and given the use of canned product, it is said to date to the 1920s to early 30s. Spicy and hearty! Serve with hot tortillas."
ins: In a large pot over medium heat, cook ground beef until evenly brown. Stir in onions, and saute until soft and translucent. Season with chili powder, and cook for about 2 minutes. Add potatoes, carrots, hominy, tomatoes and chilies. Pour in beef broth. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Reduce heat, and simmer 2 hours, or until potatoes and carrots are tender.
